valueCoding.display: The content of the Questionnaire Response transferred to this Questionnaire during form launch

extension.valueString: The Initiate a Study Questionnaire Response content that will be used to pre-populate this Questionnaire

valueExpression.description: variable to store the incoming data from the launchContext extension for populate and other expressions
valueExpression.name: lookupInitiateStudy

valueExpression.description: site that this Continuing Review form pertains to
valueExpression.name: siteForForm

item.text: Study Title from the Informed Consent
Number assigned to the protocol by IRB
Current intervention status.  This can be used by the IRB to determine that continuing review is no longer required.

valueCoding.display: Temporarily Closed to Accrual and Intervention

item.text: Status of the study overall. Study Status can also be used by the IRB to determine that continuing review is no longer required.
Funding Source(check all that are applicable)
The funding source for the study. Note that a single study can have multiple funding sources and that the funding sources can change over time.
Is this Continuing Review Form being submitted by the lead PI site on behalf of all of the relying sites?

Select "Yes" if this Continuing Review Form is being completed by the lead principal investigator site, the study coordinating center or other administrative unit on behalf of all the relying sites in the overall study.

extension.valueMarkdown: See FHIR Specification Feedback Jira ticket FHIR-36338. Information obtained from other types of external sources (e.g. launch context, fhir-x-query, etc.) SHOULD only be used for initialExpression and calculatedExpression logic.  Other behavior such as enableWhen or answerExpression should always be driven off of answers within the Questionnaire (even if they are hidden answers that are populated from an initialExpression).

See FHIR Specification Feedback Jira ticket FHIR-36338. Information obtained from other types of external sources (e.g. launch context, fhir-x-query, etc.) SHOULD only be used for initialExpression and calculatedExpression logic.  Other behavior such as enableWhen or answerExpression should always be driven off of answers within the Questionnaire (even if they are hidden answers that are populated from an initialExpression).

item.text: If this Continuing Review Form is specific to a relying site, select the relying site in order to pre-populate the relying institution and relying site principal investigator details below.

This question and its answer will not print on the Continuing Review Form but are necessary for the form logic. If you do not want pre-population to occur, leave this question blank and manually fill in the relying institution and relying site principal investigator details.
First or given name of the site principal investigator
Suffix such as Junior (Jr.), Senior (Sr.), I, II, III, IV, etc.
Professional and Academic degrees of the site principal investigator
Site Principal Investigator Department Name or Division
An initial report is the first time that the study is reviewed.
The number of participants who are enrolled, approved to enroll, consented, withdrawn, lost to contact, screen failures, active or in follow-up, or completed study.
If this is an initial review, provide counts since study inception.  The count for the Previous Accrual should be entered as 0 when completing the questionnaire for the initial report.
Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander
Number of potentially vulnerable participants enrolled
Check the applicable checkboxes if these groups are represented in the columns above
For an initial report, skip the checkboxes for Previous Accrual
Please describe other vulnerable participants enrolled, if any:

Vulnerable persons are those who are relatively (or absolutely) incapable of protecting their own interests. More formally, they may have insufficient power, intelligence, education, resources, strength, or other needed attributes to protect their own interests. (CIOMS)
(since the study inception for an initial report)
Summary of activities in the study (since the last report if this is not an initial review)
If yes, please summarize the benefits:
Have participants been withdrawn from this study?
If yes, please summarize the withdrawals:
Have any participants or others complained about the research?
If yes, please summarize the complaints:
Has any new and relevant literature been published related to the risks or benefits associated with this research?
literature  published related to the risks or benefits associated with this research
If yes, please summarize relevance to study:
Have there been any interim findings?
Have there been any multi-center trial reports?
If yes, please summarize findings and recommendations
Have there been any data safety monitoring board reports?
If yes, please summarize findings and recommendations:
In the opinion of the Principal Investigator, have the risks or potential benefits changed?
If yes, please summarize the changes:
Has an audit of the research been conducted by a federal agency or sponsor?
Have there been any presentations or publications (including abstracts) from this research?
Have there been any substantial changes to the study (protocol, consent forms, or other study documents) or to the risk-benefit assessment?
If yes, please summarize the changes:
Was informed consent obtained from all enrolled participants?
Has there been any other relevant information regarding this protocol?
Any adverse events (medical and/or non-medical) during the previous continuing review period (or since the study inception for an initial report)
Have there been any internal or local adverse events in the research?
Did these adverse events occur at the frequency and level of severity expected?
Have any protocol deviations or violations occurred in this study?
If yes, please describe the protocol deviations or violations
Has there been a change in the financial disclosure status of the Principal Investigator or other members of the Research Staff that has not been reported to the IRB?
Describe the file that is being attached (optional)
Attachments related to the Continuing Review can be included here. Examples are a DSMB report or an Adverse Event Report (Medical or Non-Medical).
Questionnaire Response ID for the parent Questionnaire Response (such as the Initiate a Study Questionnaire Response), if any
ID of the Research Study FHIR Resource associated with the study Questionnaire Responses, if any
Questionnaire Response ID of the local considerations Questionnaire Response, if any
